label: A2B_tP24_92_2b_b-001
title: Tetragonal (red) ZnP$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
This structure can also be found in the enantiomorphic space group $P4_{3}2_{1}2$ \#96. 
 Although (White, 1965) describes the structure as orthorhombic in the ``Experimental measurements'' section, it is indeed tetragonal. 
 ZnP$_{2}$ can also be found in a \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_mP24_14_4e_2e-001}{monoclinic (black) form}.
